heartbeatIntervalInMs.title: Define the interval in which heartbeat are sent to client.
heartbeatIntervalInMs.description: Define the interval in which heartbeat are sent to client. Interval must be higher or equal than 2000ms. Each heartbeat will be sent as extra empty comment ':'

metadataAsComment.title: Allow sending messages metadata to client as SSE comments.
metadataAsComment.description: Allow sending messages metadata to client as SSE comments. Each metadata will be sent as extra line following ':key=value' format

headersAsComment.title: Allow sending messages headers to client as SSE comments.
headersAsComment.description: Allow sending messages headers to client as SSE comments. Each header will be sent as extra line following ':key=value' format
